actor_awards.notes: Sister of Audrey Meadows and wife of Steve Allen. She was a regular panelist on 'I've Got a Secret' and received Emmy nominations for her work in 'High Society', 'Meeting of Minds', and 'St. Elsewhere'. She was also known for her sharp wit and red hair.

filmography.title: Undercurrent
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated socialite and romantic rival who casts doubt in the mind of the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a wealthy industrialist only to begin suspecting that he may have murdered his missing brother.

filmography.title: Lady in the Lake
filmography.role_description: A treacherous and icy landlady involved in a murder investigation in this unique first-person POV noir.
filmography.plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired to find a missing woman, leading to a complex web of murder and deception.

filmography.title: Song of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: A society woman whose husband becomes a suspect in the murder of a bandleader.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles investigate the murder of a bandleader aboard a gambling ship.

filmography.title: Dark Delusion
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman involved in the politics of a hospital where a doctor tries to save a patient from being institutionalized.
filmography.plot: A doctor fights to prove that a young woman's mental instability is physical rather than psychological.

filmography.title: The Luck of the Irish
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, ambitious fiancée of a political reporter, who represents the materialistic life he is reconsidering.
filmography.plot: A reporter tries to choose between his wealthy fiancée and a sweet Irish girl, with the help of a leprechaun.

filmography.title: Enchantment
filmography.role_description: The domineering sister who interferes with her siblings' romantic happiness.
filmography.plot: An elderly man recalls his past love and tries to help his great-niece avoid making the same mistakes.

filmography.title: The Fat Man
filmography.role_description: A nurse who becomes a person of interest in a murder investigation involving a dentist.
filmography.plot: An obese private detective investigates the murder of a dentist and uncovers a deeper conspiracy.

filmography.title: David and Bathsheba
filmography.role_description: King David's first wife who becomes bitter and critical of his leadership and affair.
filmography.plot: King David of Israel falls in love with the wife of one of his captains, leading to tragic consequences.

filmography.title: College Confidential
filmography.role_description: A reporter who covers a sociology professor's controversial survey on student lifestyles.
filmography.plot: A sociology professor conducts a survey on the moral standards of the younger generation, sparking a scandal.

filmography.title: Norman... Is That You?
filmography.role_description: The wife involved in a family crisis when a father discovers his son is gay.
filmography.plot: A father visits his son in Los Angeles only to discover that his son is gay and living with a partner.

filmography.title: City Slickers
filmography.role_description: The overbearing mother of the main character who calls him with inappropriate updates.
filmography.plot: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

filmography.title: The Player
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself in Robert Altman's satire of Hollywood.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer he rejected, but which one?

filmography.title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
filmography.role_description: Reprises her role as the mother, providing voice work and screen presence.
filmography.plot: Mitch Robbins discovers a treasure map in the headband of Curly's old hat and heads back West to find the gold.

filmography.title: The Story of Us
filmography.role_description: The mother of Michelle Pfeiffer's character, providing moments of family comedy and tension.
filmography.plot: A married couple facing a separation attempts to assess their relationship and determine if they should stay together.

filmography.title: Alice in Wonderland
filmography.role_description: The tyrannical, shouting Queen who governs Wonderland in this star-studded TV adaptation. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a fantasy world populated by peculiar anthropomorphic creatures.

filmography.title: James Dean
filmography.role_description: Portrays the legendary Hollywood gossip columnist in this biographical film. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A biopic about the life and career of actor James Dean.

filmography.title: The Rating Game
filmography.role_description: The mother of a trucking magnate who tries to break into the television business. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A wealthy trucking magnate attempts to get a television show on the air by manipulating the ratings system.

filmography.title: Miss All-American Beauty
filmography.role_description: The strict pageant coordinator who tries to mold the winning contestant. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A young pianist wins a beauty pageant and must deal with the rigorous demands of her new title.

filmography.title: A Masterpiece of Murder
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman involved in a mystery solved by an impoverished sleuth and a retired cop. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: An aging, impoverished private eye teams up with a retired police detective to solve a murder.

filmography.title: Parent Trap: Hawaiian Honeymoon
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow who becomes a target for a con artist in this sequel. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: The Wyatt triplets help their father and his new wife on their honeymoon in Hawaii while dealing with a family inheritance.

filmography.title: Murder by the Book
filmography.role_description: The wife of a mystery writer who gets involved in a real-life mystery. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A mild-mannered mystery writer decides to murder the flashy detective character he created.
